author: freejobalert.com
title: West Bengal Police Recruitment 2017 – Software Developer Posts
text: West Bengal Police Recruitment 2017 – Software Developer Posts West Bengal Police Recruitment 2017 – Software Developer Posts: West Bengal Police has published notification for the recruitment of Software Developer vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 24-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. West Bengal Police Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 04 Name of the Post: Software Developer Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess 1st Class MCA or 1st Class M.Sc in IT/ Computer Science or 1st Class BE/ B.Tech in Computer Science with Skills in Software Design, Development, Documentation & Implementation Support with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may send their detailed resume in the prescribed format by e mail to ploicewb@gmail.com on or before 24-03-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Application: 24-03-2017. For more details like professional fee, experience, duration & other information click on the link given below….
